lead_paragraph: The explosive, triacetone triperoxide, can be made with basic chemistry skills and relatively simple equipment, but the process is risky and tedious.

headline.print_headline: Explosive Found in Attackers’ Home Is Dangerous and Tedious to Produce
headline.main: Quantity of Explosive Found in Belgium Surprises Officials

snippet: The explosive, triacetone triperoxide, can be made with basic chemistry skills and relatively simple equipment, but the process is risky and tedious.
abstract: Belgian authorities' discovery of over 30 pounds of explosive TATP, also known as triacetone triperoxide, in house used by perpetrators of Brussels attacks shocks many experts who say quantity is far larger than they had predicted terrorists were capable of producing.
